messages.title: SECURING JOBS FOR HARD WORKING PEOPLE
messages.content: More jobs, better transport, top schools are part of Amber's vision

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A commitment to more jobs by supporting local businesses and the creation of a 'centre of excellence' hospital.
Improvements in transport with plans for a high speed rail.
Investing in education to provide top schools.

mentions.candidate: Amber's name appears prominently as the candidate being promoted.
mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: References to Alex Salmond suggest competition or strategic opposition.
mentions.tacticalSituation: Mentions of tactical voting considerations with phrases such as 'Don’t let your vote here leave Alex Salmond pulling the strings.'

issues.health: Plans for the creation of a 'centre of excellence' hospital.

images.caption: Amber in the constituency with supporters.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet content references broad Conservative Party commitments, suggesting that this campaign material is from a period close to a General Election.
